transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello sir.

Customer: Hello hello sir kekuthungala kekutha

Customer: Kekuthunga sir sollunga

Customer: India mart seller sir na vishmi manufacturing

Customer: Ethu sir

Customer: India mart customer care thane inga
Executive: Aama neenga company name sollunga
Customer: India mart vishmi manufacturing

Executive: Ah okay sollunga sir

Customer: Sir oru leads kooda varamatinguthu sir ithula na ethani vaati than message pannano response pannano enaku puriyamatinguthu yarume vanthu response pannamatinguthu last time neenga ethume last time ellam response pannala sir na athukuthan ungalluku koopitrunden leads vanthu use panrathuku plus neenga buyleads ethume use pannama irunthinganu sonnenga response pannalannu solli one hour ah vanthu phone la call pesittu irunthindenga oru 100 piece 50 piece na requirement vanthuchina eppadi sir business nadatha mudiyum ithula enaku payment pannumbothu yenna solli payment pannanga avanga aal aalaye solittu iruntha enna sir response pannala one hour na yenaki time vituttu avangakitta pesittu irukrathu ithu sir na response pannalaina sir avanga one month la varlaina na refund pannrennu solli irunthanga athu ellam vanthu kekka mudiyuma ipo sir ipo one month la onnu ethume mudiyala na refund pannrennu solla mudiyuma ipo kaasu vanthu refund panna mudiyuma yen sir ippadi ellam pannittu irukkinga aal aalu oru oru aalu oru oru pesuna enna sir panrathu ipo oru vaarama enaku oru 10 naala business eh illannu irunthindenga neenga asalta solringa vanthu join pannunga join pannungannu enna artham sir ithu unga pinadiye irukanuma enna ithu yen varla ethuku varlannu solli unga pinadiye irukanuma neenga solrathu ellam naal fulla ungakitteye irukanuma enaku velaiye vera illaiya sir enaku
Executive: Okay sir neenga issue sollunga na athuku apparam na ungalluku guide panren yenna ipo buyleads ippo marupadiyum marupadiyum kekkireenga ethani vaati than sir sollanum illa na ethani vaati sollanum enaku issue athuthan athuthan solli ethani vaati yar yar kitta sollanum sollunga sir evlo vaati solli irukken theriyuma ungalluku payment kekkumbothu mattum than correct ah kekkiringala time ku correct ah kekkiringala sir pannunga pannunga pannungannu appo yen response panna matingiringa yenna summa va payment kattittu namma ukkarren 10 15 naal order illa sir leads kooda edukala na poi paarunga sir na eppadi leads create panrathu
Executive: Okay

Customer: Oru panna mudiyuma pannunga sir illaina refund panni vittuttu poitte irunga sir business illaina ethuku namma kitta force panniringa ipo okay illa neenga sir na athuthan kekkiren sir 50 100 piece vachikittu na enna sir pannanu neenga kodukrathu 50 100 piece la na requirement athu varave matinguthu order confirm achina avathu theriyuma inga irunthu na courier pannale enaku na pocket money pottuthan anuppa mudiyum okay sir ethani vaati than sir sollanum yar yar kitta sir sollanum na naanuma porumaiya irunga inniki illaina naalaki vanthurum naalaki vanthurum na vittutte irunthindana neenga ethume kodukkave matingiringa sir na ippo veshtama ungalluku explain pannattuma ennanu sir ithu ethuthan sir ellarume solringa ethani vaati than sir explain pannininga neenga illa enaku theriyathunnu ninaichikiringala india mart la ethu panna enaku theriyathu ethani vaati than case panna ethani vaati than create pannano sir neenga ellame vanthu inga paarunga sir ellam vanthu sir na solrathu kelunga sir unga issue illa yen problem na ungakitte solittu irukken neenga yen pesathinga sir ethani vaati than sir solluvinga athaiye neenga solluvinga na kekkiren neenga sollunga neenga sollunga na kekkiren enna sir kekkiringa ethani per than sir ippadi pannuvingannu na kekkiren ethani vaati na sollanum sir enaku leads kodungannu na yenna unga pinadiye irukanuma naal fullave sir ippo eduthu paarunga sir eduthu na yenna lead edikkama irunthana enna artham sir ithuku appo na ethuku india mart la irunthu na vanthu payment pannano aal irunthu enaku business vanthana na enna problem neenga inniki than solringa ithuku munnadi koopittu oru welcome call call pannale neenga edukave illa calla enga sir neenga solli kelunga sir ippo enaku satisfaction illa enaku refund panna panna mudiyuma mudiyathu illa appo enaku business koduthathane na veshta kaasu kattittu na ennathuku sir na kaasu kattittu summa ukkarathuku oru nimisham unga kitta sales person enna commitment koduthangannu sollunga na inga team la pesuren so enna option namma panna mudiyuma paarunga india mart thana ippo ippo kootta na pesunathe illa naanum vanthu sari inniki illaina naalaki vanthurum vanthurum vanthurumnu solli ethani naal than sir wait pannanum sir enga employee ku vanthu fees salary koduthuttu avan use panrathu avanuku varla varlannu solli naane phone rendu phone layum download panni vachikittu naane paakuren enna oru ithu kooda varamatinguthunna enna artham ithuku na ethani per than sollanum call panni call panni neenga sollunga team change pannittanga ippo anga poi move pannirukkanga ippo aidum sir ippo aidum sir ethani per than sir solluvanga illa ore issue na solitte irukanuma aarambathula irunthu na ithuthan solittu irukken aidum sir aidum sir aidum ithuthan issue ungalluku aidum sir ethani vaati than solluvinga neengalum verum pechu than irukuthu skill la kaanume oru anuppa mudiyumna anuppungannu sollidunga sir illa ippadi than panna mudiyumna enaku refund panni vidunga na yarukitte complaint pannunumnu neenga sollunga proper ah enaku mail anuppattuma sollunga sir enna commitment koduthangannu na kekkiren sir illa namma team la sir sir piece requirement varamatinguthu sir yen profile sir yen profile poi paarunga sir enna 100 50 piece vachikittu na enna sir panrathu na na pottu irukrathu catalog la correct ah vanthu irukuthannu paarunga illa yen feedback paarunga na evlo leads eduthu irukken evlo convert aayirukuthunnu neenga paarunga consumption evlo pannirukken paarunga pona month overall ah 57 leads eduthu irukkinga sir ellam evlo quantity la eduthu irukken paarunga sir athu enna 100 50 piece vachikittu na enna sir panrathu ippo na ungalluku screenshot anuppuma athu neenga solringale avlo avlo sir fulla kekunga sir solrathu avlo ethu neenga sonningale na ellame screenshot anuppanuma illa evlo order convert aayirukuthunnu oru order kooda enaku convert aagala athu theriyuma 100 50 piece koduthingana eppadi athu mould ke enaku 600 aayidum na seirathuku customize ku antha 600 avana koduppa illa india mart koduppangala illa enga irunthu courier panna yen pocket money thane pothu na enna ketten leather keychains ke enaku 500 rupees minimum vachikittu kodungannren athu illame vera enna ennavo pottu irukkinga evlo vaati than naanum correction pannunnum evlo vaati than na track maathanum sir ithu sir ithu maathuren evlo vaati than na whatsapp la anuppirukken theriyuma ithuthan sir enaku thevai ithuthan sir na panrathunnu solli sir ithuthan sir update aagumnu solli ethani vaati than solluvinga aal aalu sir yaruku neenga share pannininga neenga enaku pesavum vida matingiringa yar enaku enna sir theriyum aal aalu oru oru number la call panniningana enaku enna sir theriyum yar enaku account manager yar enaku account allocate panrannu solli oru aal iruntha thane sir maathi maathi pesunana enna panrathu contract evlo irukuthu theriyuma india mart la irunthu neenga than manager neenga than manager na than manager solli solli enna irunthalum en kitta sollunga evlo vaati than sollanum na ungalluku koopitten neenga en kitta pesurathuku ready aave illa call ah cut pannittinga last time sir neenga ippo vanthirukkinga sir na one hour ah na ukkarnthana illaiya athu neengala illa yaaru aalu vanthangannu enaku theriyala na one hour ukkarnthunden sir en kitta pesala appo avanga kelunga sir aal aalu phone pannittu enna ellarukittayum one one hour ah na ukkaranuma enna athuthan enaku velaiya yen kitta ukkarala avangakitta ukkaralanna neenga kelunga discuss pannunga anga athu vittuttu yen enaku yen ippadi panringinga ippo illa sir inga team eppadingurathu first payment mattum delay panniningana avlo panniningale payment delay pannathuku avlo panniningale ethani naal than na pannathe illa avlo sonni kooda na vanthu trust ah panna paaren enaku than ithu enaku thevai than sir ithu correct ah panni panringannu paathingala sir avan number save pannala avan pesumbothu avangakitta enakkitta sonnathu enna na appadi ungalluku satisfaction illaina refund pannrennu solli contact kooda illa avangalodathu na illaina avangakitte pesi iruppen avanga ippo ungakitta commitment koduthangala satisfaction illaina na refund pannrennu aama sir sonnanga sir enna na poiya solla poren ippo okay appana na ungalluku manager kooda connect panren neenga vanthuttu ithai neenga avangakitteyum sollunga oru mail aavum kodunga namma vanthuttu ithai further ah process panni ungalluku refund kodukka possible irunthuna athai namma vaangidalaam yenna avanga solli irukkangannu neenga solringa summa uruttu kathai ellam vidathinga sir possible iruntha kodukkarathu ithai ellam na kelvi kettaachu sir ithai ellam ethani illai ethani illai ethani ellam ketta ithai ellam summa ithu pannathinga sir enaku lead kodukka mudiyuma mudiyatha illaina sollidunga athai kaasu enaku thevai illa na appadiye vitturren sariya summa ithu ithu ippo aayidum sir naalaki aayidum sir oru moonu naal kazhichu paarunga sir one week kazhichu paarunga sir ithai kathai ellam vittuttu time waste pannathinga sir correct ah kodunga illaina vitturunga athuthan na solla varen sir neenga summa kaasu vaangittu correct ah pannunga correct ah pannungannu solli summa ithu pannittu irukathinga sir naanum evlo naal than sir na porumaiya ponum enna oru lead convert aagalanna na enna artham pannanu india mart la pottu na kaasu neenga oru nimisham line la irunga na manager line la edukkiren neenga enna pesunannu na kekkiren sir pesunga ippo aama sir ungallukaka than na wait pannittu irunthunanna ella velaiyum vittu ungakitte na pesanum illa neenga connect pannunga na line la edukkiren line la edukkiren ore nimisham irunga the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line neengal pesum nabar ungal azhaippai holdil vaithullar dayavu seithu lineil kaathirukkavum aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line neengal pesum nabar ungal azhaippai holdil vaithullar dayavu seithu lineil kaathirukkavum aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain aana onnum illama ukkarnthuttu irukkiren the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line neengal pesum nabar ungal azhaippai holdil vaithullar aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line neengal pesum nabar ungal azhaippai holdil vaithullar aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line neengal pesum nabar ungal azhaippai holdil vaithullar aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line neengal pesum nabar ungal azhaippai holdil vaithullar dayavu seithu hello hello sir na solren paarunga sir avan per ennanu kettingala na screenshot anuppuren paarunga sir enaku whatsapp panren anuppunga athe maari ippo unga line la yen manager varuvanga avanga call attend pannunga sir na ungalluku whatsapp panren enaku screenshot anuppunga sir ok sir whatsapp la per mattum sollunga andha document eduthu sollunga sir whatsapp la message pannirukkanga sir whatsapp la message pannirukken whatsapp la adha avangakitte pesunuma sir ippo aama sir aama sir attend pannunga na ungalluku whatsapp pannirukken enaku anuppunga screenshot
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving any leads. 

- Wants refund due to lack of business.

- Frustrated with constant follow-ups and unfulfilled promises.



Resolution:

- Executive put the call on hold.

- Executive assured to connect with manager.

- Asked customer to share details on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share details on WhatsApp.

- Manager will connect with the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, customer service, leads
